cantrips.name: Acid Splash
cantrips.description: You splash a glob of acid that deals 1d6 acid damage and 1 persistent acid damage to all creatures in a 5-foot burst.

cantrips.name: Daze
cantrips.description: You cloud the target's mind; the target must attempt a Will save. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

cantrips.name: Electric Arc
cantrips.description: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal electricity damage equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

cantrips.name: Light
cantrips.duration: Until the next time you make your daily preparations
cantrips.description: The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch.

cantrips.name: Mage Hand
cantrips.description: You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet.

cantrips.name: Prestidigitation
cantrips.description: The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell.

cantrips.name: Ray of Frost
cantrips.description: You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 1d4+1 cold damage.

cantrips.name: Shield
cantrips.duration: Until the start of your next turn
cantrips.description: You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

level_1.name: Burning Hands
level_1.description: Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area.

level_1.name: Charm
level_1.description: To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save.

level_1.name: Heal
level_1.description: You channel positive energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points.

level_1.name: Magic Missile
level_1.description: You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage.

level_1.name: Sleep
level_1.duration: Until the next time you make your daily preparations
level_1.description: Each creature in the area becomes drowsy and might fall asleep. A creature that falls asleep from this spell doesn't fall prone.

level_1.name: True Strike
level_1.duration: Until the end of your turn
level_1.description: A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result.

level_2.name: Blur
level_2.description: The target's form appears blurred. It becomes concealed. As normal for the concealed condition, creatures must attempt a DC 5 flat check when targeting the blurred creature with an attack, spell, or other effect.

level_2.name: Invisibility
level_2.description: Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes invisible. This makes it undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it hidden to them instead.

level_2.name: Mirror Image
level_2.description: Three illusory images of you swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you.

level_2.name: Scorching Ray
level_2.description: You fire a ray of scorching flame. Make a spell attack roll against a single creature. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

level_2.name: Web
level_2.description: You create a sticky web in the area that impedes creatures' movement each time they try to move through it.

level_3.name: Fireball
level_3.description: A roaring blast of fire appears at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage.

level_3.name: Haste
level_3.description: Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each turn only for Strike, Stride, or Step actions.

level_3.name: Lightning Bolt
level_3.description: A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.
